sentence: Friday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index reaching a historical high.
The index closed at 6,210.19 up 4.93 for the day.
The index had a previous high 6205.25689 on 05/25/2017.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 1.58 billion.
Declining stocks led advancers by 1.12 to 1 ratio.
There were 1351 advancers and 1514 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 66 stocks reached a 52 week high and 35 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed up .17% for the day; a total of 9.99 points.
Shire plc ( SHPG ) had the largest percent change down (-4.16%) while Sirius XM Holdings Inc. ( SIRI ) had the largest percent change gain rising 3.52%.
The Dow Jones index closed down -.01% for the day; a total of -2.67 points.
Home Depot, Inc. (The) ( HD ) had the largest percent change down (-1%) while Walt Disney Company (The) ( DIS ) had the largest percent change gain rising 1.06%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
